title: Breathe Into Me
description: Ava's love for Brett is unconditional, it has been since his rookie year. But her love for him went unnoticed, by him anyway. As his hockey career blossomed, their love didn't. They remained friends, but when he married Dianne, she felt it was time to put distance between them.Can she forgive him for marrying another, for breaking her heart? Brett never knew she loved him, until his life falls apart, the only question now is, is it too late for him to win Ava back?
author: Michelle Jurgens
